test.name: Demo test case to fetch XML response

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=demosession, url=http://thomas-bayer.com, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Get Request
kw.doc: Send a GET request on the session object found using the given `alias`
kw.msg: GET Request : url=http://thomas-bayer.com/sqlrest/CUSTOMER/15 path_url=/sqlrest/CUSTOMER/15 headers={'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.24.0'} body=None

GET Response : url=http://thomas-bayer.com/sqlrest/CUSTOMER/15 status=200, reason=OK body=<?xml version="1.0" standalone="no"?><CUSTOMER xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"> <ID>15</ID> <FIRSTNAME>Bill</FIRSTNAME> <LASTNAME>Clancy</LASTNAME> <STREET>319 Upland Pl.</STREET> <CITY>Seattle</CITY> </CUSTOMER>

kw.name: Convert To String
kw.doc: Converts the given item to a Unicode string.

kw.name: Parse Xml
kw.doc: Parses the given XML file or string into an element structure.
